main.site.title: luca Health Department
main.site.meta: The tool helps the health department to easily keep track of processes within the luca system.
tan.site.title: luca TAN Entry
tan.site.meta: Entry page for PINs that the staff of your health department gets from luca users.
header.subtitle: Health-Department
login.keyFile.error.title: invalid key file
profile.name: Health department
profile.changePassword.error.weakPasswor: New password does not meet the criteria.
modal.registerHealthDepartment.title: Setup
modal.registerHealthDepartment.step0.exp: The key file for this health department was generated. Please make sure to download the file and not to lose it. You will need it to decrypt the data from requested locations.
modal.registerHealthDepartment.step1.exp: That's it! You can finish the setup process now.
modal.tanGenerator.title: Share TAN list
modal.tanGenerator.info: In order for other health department employees without luca access to handle infections of luca users you can share the following link. The displayed TAN is used to share the history of the luca user. An infected luca user needs the tan in order to complete history sharing process.
modal.uploadKeyModal.title: Select keyfile
modal.uploadKeyModal.info: Before you can proceed you need to select your key file in order to decrypt data.
modal.dataRequest.confirmation: Are you sure you want to send a data request to {venue}? This action cannot be undone.
modal.trackInfection.title: Track new infection
modal.trackInfection.info: luca users can share their histrory with your health department. Therefore you need to the tan of that user which is displayed in the history of the luca app.
modal.trackInfection.tan.error.min: This part of the user TAN can't be unter 4 character
modal.trackInfection.error.staticTracing: An error occured while processing static tan
modal.trackInfection.error.userTracing: An error occured while processing user tan
modal.trackInfection.error.emptyUserTrac: User history is empty. The process was not created.
modal.trackInfection.error.decryptionFai: The transfer could not be decrypted.
modal.trackInfection.confirmation: Are you sure you want to track a new infection chain? This action cannot be undone.

error.password.simple: Passwords must have a minumum length of 9 characters. They also need to contain at least one lowercase, uppercase, special character and a number.

userManagement.confirm.text: Do you really want to delete this user account?
userManagement.create.headline: Add employee
userManagement.create.info: As admin you can create accounts for other employees. Please provide the following information:
userManagement.created.info: The new employee was created and an initial password was set. The new employee is now able to log in the console with the provided email and password. Please make sure to give the following password as well as the health department certificate to your new employee. You will not be able to retrieve the password again after you closed this window.
